Pennytree is a settlement in the [[Riverlands]], the region controlled by [[House Tully]] of [[Riverrun]]. It is located northeast of Riverrun, in between [[Stone Hedge]], seat of [[House Bracken]] and [[Raventree Hall]], seat of [[House Blackwood]].
sections.In the Books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Pennytree lies in the frontline of frequent border disputes between the Blackwoods and Brackens and possession of the town has changed a lot over the centuries. It is named for a huge old oak tree, to which hundreds of copper pennies have been nailed.

[[Duncan the Tall]], as a young boy born in [[Flea Bottom]], once squired for a hedge knight called Ser Arlan, hailing from Pennytree.
